services.name: Full Planning & Coordination
services.description: Comprehensive end-to-end event planning, design, and management.

services.name: Partial Planning
services.description: Assistance with specific elements of your event, such as supplier sourcing or design.

services.name: Day-of Coordination
services.description: On-the-day management to ensure your event runs smoothly.

services.name: 3-Course Meal (Standard)
services.description: A high-quality 3-course meal. Price is per person.

services.name: 3-Course Meal (Premium)
services.description: A premium 3-course meal with more luxurious ingredients. Price is per person.

services.name: Buffet (Standard)
services.description: A standard buffet selection. Price is per person.

services.name: Buffet (Premium)
services.description: A premium buffet with a wider selection of dishes. Price is per person.

services.name: Evening Food
services.description: Lighter fare for the evening part of your event. Price is per person.

services.name: Dry Hire (Standard)
services.description: Standard venue-only hire.

services.name: Dry Hire (Premium)
services.description: Premium venue-only hire, typically for more exclusive locations.

services.name: Photographer (Full Day)
services.description: A professional photographer for the full duration of the event.

services.name: Videographer (Full Day)
services.description: A professional videographer for the full duration of the event.

services.name: Photo & Video Bundle (Full Day)
services.description: A photographer and videographer for the full day, often at a discounted rate.

services.name: Floral Design (Standard)
services.description: Standard floral arrangements for the venue and bridal party.

services.name: Floral Design (Luxury)
services.description: Luxury, elaborate floral arrangements and installations.

services.name: Venue Styling & Decor
services.description: Comprehensive venue styling, including lighting, furniture, and props (excluding flowers).

services.name: DJ (4-hour set)
services.description: A professional DJ for a 4-hour set.

services.name: Live Band (4-piece)
services.description: A 4-piece live band for the evening entertainment.

services.name: Custom Printed Invitations
services.description: Bespoke printed invitations. Price is per person/household.

services.name: Digital Invitations & RSVP Website
services.description: A custom-designed digital invitation and RSVP website.

services.name: Guest Favors
services.description: Small gifts for each guest. Price is per person.
